Title: Relates to the operation or riding upon a bicycle with electric assist by persons under the age of sixteen
Summary: Relates to the operation of or riding upon a bicycle with electric assist by persons under the age of sixteen; requires that passengers under the age of 16 wear a helmet and prohibits persons under 16 from operating or riding upon a class three bicycle with electric assist.
LawCode: Amd ยง1242, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation or riding upon a bicycle with electric assist by persons under the age of sixteen
